task_name: WI-040: Backend: Implement Secure Formula Execution Lambda
resource_notes: Requires deep security expertise and knowledge of V8 isolates. The 'isolated-vm' library has a steep learning curve.
alternative_approach: Could be outsourced to a security specialist contractor, but would add integration overhead.
risk_factors: RISK-001: Security vulnerability in sandbox implementation.
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory code review by security champion; implement multi-layered Lambda security (IAM, no network, strict limits).

resource_notes: Requires strong understanding of database transactions and concurrency control to prevent race conditions.
alternative_approach: A simpler 'server-always-wins' approach could be used, but with a worse user experience.
risk_factors: RISK-002: Data loss or corruption from incorrect conflict resolution logic.
mitigation_strategy: Backend must be the authoritative source for timestamps. Implement extensive E2E tests simulating offline/online transitions.

task_name: WI-014: GitHub Actions: Implement Build & Deploy Stage
resource_notes: Complex orchestration of build, push, migration, and deployment steps. Blue/Green strategy adds complexity.
alternative_approach: Simpler rolling update deployment, but with higher risk and potential downtime.
risk_factors: RISK-003: Delays in pipeline setup could block all feature development.
mitigation_strategy: Prioritize a minimum viable pipeline first, then iterate on advanced features like Blue/Green.

task_name: WI-050: Frontend: Implement Full Keyboard Navigation
resource_notes: Requires auditing and refactoring every interactive component in the application. Time-consuming and detail-oriented.
alternative_approach: None, this is a mandatory compliance requirement.
risk_factors: RISK-004: Failure to meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards.
mitigation_strategy: Integrate automated accessibility testing into CI; conduct mandatory developer training; include manual testing in Definition of Done.
